claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a screenshot of the Flublok® Quadrivalent prescribing information. Under the “Indications and Usage” section it states that Flublok is approved “for active immunization for the prevention of disease caused by influenza virus subtypes A and type B contained in the vaccine” in “Adults 18 years of age and older.” This directly supports the claim that Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older.
